pageContext.claim: “So many people conveniently forget that Turkey is a big trading partner of the United States, in fact they make the structural steel frame for our F-35 Fighter Jet.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump apparently is out of date. In July, the administration announced via a White House statement that it kicked Turkey out of the F-35 program a few months ago after Ankara defied explicit requests not to buy Russia’s S-400 missile system. “Turkey’s decision to purchase Russian S-400 air defense systems renders its continued involvement with the F-35 impossible,” the White House statement said. “The F-35 cannot coexist with a Russian intelligence collection platform that will be used to learn about its advanced capabilities.”
